1.content: First, we need to decide on a character. So, who should it be?
1.title: Starting

choices: Some other time in the anime
11.content: When should this take place?
11.title: Time

115.content: Maka was running towards the library, Stein had just told the class that he decided to give everyone a test in a few days, so they better study up. Maka, wanting to keep her top spot, ran to the library as soon as class was out. Once there, she started looking for a book that might be able to help her. She was so lost in thought, that she didn't notice the book near her feet until she tripped on it. After she stood back up, she noticed the book and decided to pick it up. As fate would have it, the first few pages were blank, and while turning a page, Maka got a paper cut. Before she could so much as say 'ouch,' the spell placed on the book sent her soul flying into...
115.title: The swap

1151.content: Who's P.O.V. should we follow?
1151.title: P.O.V.

11512.content:
Maka blinked once to regain her senses, and another time because she wasn't where she was a minute ago. Now, she was lying down on the couch from the apartment that she shared with Soul with an open textbook in one hand and the TV remote in the other. She started to speak, "What-"

Her now red eyes widened as she realized that wasn't her voice, and she got up and ran to the bathroom so that she could see her reflection. Once she got there, she stared at the reflection with shock clear on her face, which was clearly reflected in the reflection of Soul's face.

Maka shook her new head, "N-no way. I'm Soul?!"
11512.title: Maka

115122.content: Is Maka calm about this, confident that things will return to normal soon and that she should relax and try to enjoy this?
115122.title: Like it?

1151221.content: Maka takes a deep breathe, "Calm down, calm down. I-I'm sure there's a logical reason for this. I just have to find out what it is. I'm sure that this is nothing to be alarmed at. Besides," she blushed as she continued, "there are worse people to be than Soul."
1151221.title: Calm Maka

info.brief_description: Choose a character, then choose who they swap with. Soul Eater style.
info.description:
800 years ago, a with was experimenting on souls, trying to figure out how they worked. In her research, she created a body swap spell, and used that spell on a book. Now, the book has the power to swap bodies, but the user can't choose who they swap with. A few weeks ago, the book was found by a DWMA squad and brought back to the academy. Not seeing it as a threat, they just left it in the library. That's where the story begins.

Just about everything is allowed. I'm not kidding, I'll allow all kinds of smut and/or murder scenes. All that I ask is that you don't just start doing random stuff (TG, TF, AP, AR, etc...) without e-mailing me first.

Thanks, and enjoy.
